short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a new ordering option to private leaderboards, showing points and rankings based on delta times

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This shows a new [Delta score] option under the list of ordering methods. To use it just click on [Ordering] on any private leaderboard page then click on [Delta score].
